keyword: calories in a sesame seed bagel
title: Calories in a Sesame Seed Bagel
meta_description: Discover calories in a sesame seed bagel, including full nutrition breakdown with carbs, protein, fat, and easy tweaks for variations.
h1: Calories in a Sesame Seed Bagel
assumptions: Standard size (about 85g), baked plain with sesame seeds, no added toppings or butter.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by brand, size, baking method, and added ingredients. Check labels when available.

quick_answer.text: A sesame seed bagel provides ~290 kcal, mostly from carbs, with 10g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in a sesame seed bagel?
faqs.a: Approximately 290 kcal for one standard sesame seed bagel.

faqs.q: What are the carbs in a sesame seed bagel?
faqs.a: About 56g total carbs, including 2.5g fiber and 5g sugars.

faqs.q: Is a sesame seed bagel high in protein?
faqs.a: It has around 10g protein per bagel, moderate for a carb-focused item.

faqs.q: How does sodium content compare in bagels?
faqs.a: Typically 450mg sodium per sesame seed bagel; varies by brand.

faqs.q: Are sesame seeds adding many calories?
faqs.a: Sesame seeds contribute minimal calories (~10-15 kcal) but add healthy fats.
